body_html: @lemairecarl I think we should take device properties and e.g. have a 25% threshold on imbalance in both memory and #CUDA cores. Also, don't check all GPUs, but those that are explicitly specified to be used in data parallel. If someone has 4 old GPUs then they can use DP, we should only warn that it runs as slow as the slowest one.
